dialogues.name: Ally
dialogues.dialogueText: After defeating the corrupted King, what happened to our hero?

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: Well. Heroes are not different from ordinary people.

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: Our hero also meets his end eventually.

dialogues.name: Tommy
dialogues.dialogueText: Did he die young fighting another dragon?

dialogues.name: Tommy
dialogues.dialogueText: Or he became the dragon itself?

dialogues.name: Ally
dialogues.dialogueText: Guess if I had that power, I would be treated as a monster.

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: Unfortunately, no records say anything about our hero.

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: But many years later, tales said villages saw...

dialogues.name: Master
dialogues.dialogueText: ...Some strange guy chasing his best friend all day.
